initial_expr: ∀ (input : List Int) (i : Nat) (hi : i < input.length) (p : Nat) (hp : p = (pileAssignment input)[i]!) (hp_lt : p < (stateAtStep input i).piles.size), (stateAtStep input (i + 1)).piles[p]! = input[i]!

proof_steps.tactic: intro input i hi p hp hp_lt
have h_state_i : (stateAfter input (initLISState input) i).processed = i := by rw [stateAfter_processed]; simp [initLISState]; omega
have h_proc_lt : (stateAfter input (initLISState input) i).processed < input.length := by rw [h_state_i]; exact hi
conv_lhs => rw [show i + 1 = i + 1 from rfl]; unfold stateAfter; simp only [Nat.add_one_ne_zero, ↓reduceIte]

tactic_history: intro input i hi p hp hp_lt
have h_state_i : (stateAfter input (initLISState input) i).processed = i := by rw [stateAfter_processed]; simp [initLISState]; omega
have h_proc_lt : (stateAfter input (initLISState input) i).processed < input.length := by rw [h_state_i]; exact hi
conv_lhs => rw [show i + 1 = i + 1 from rfl]; unfold stateAfter; simp only [Nat.add_one_ne_zero, ↓reduceIte]

goals.target:
(if h : (initLISState input).processed < input.length then
        stateAfter input (processElement input (initLISState input) h) (i + 1 - 1)
      else initLISState input).piles[p]! =
  input[i]!
